text: Ndubuisi Godwin Kanu (November 3, 1943 â€“ January 13, 2021) was a Nigerian Navy rear admiral and politician. He was the Imo State Governor from 1976 to 1977 and Lagos State Governor from 1977 to 1978. Kanu died on January 13, 2021 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Nigerian politicians Category:People from Imo State
title: Ndubuisi Kanu
